devdoc.details: A smart contract for managing friend requests between users.

respondToFriendRequest(address,bool).details: Responds to a friend request by accepting or rejecting it.

params._accept: A boolean indicating whether the friend request is accepted (true) or rejected (false).
params._sender: The address of the user who sent the friend request.

sendFriendRequest(address).details: Sends a friend request to another user.

params._receiver: The address of the user to whom the friend request is sent.
